@correct_culture_primary_score = 100
@better_than_the_alternatives_score = 50
@always_primary_score = 1000
@never_primary_score = -1000

# EMPIRES

# special titles

# If adding another hegemon title, you need to also update e.g. NeighboringHegemonTitle/DefinitiveName custom loc, save_tribute_mission_target_scope_effect, small/adequate/excessive_gold_tribute_value, etc to support Hegemonic Tributaries

h_roman_empire = {
	color = { 167 10 0 }

	capital = c_roma # Rome
	definite_form = yes
	can_be_named_after_dynasty = no

	can_create = {
		rule_title_creation_imperial_power_projection_title_creation_trigger = yes
	}
}

h_eastern_roman_empire = {
	color = { 150 35 165 }

	capital = c_byzantion # Constantinople
	definite_form = yes
	can_be_named_after_dynasty = no

	can_create = {
		rule_title_creation_imperial_power_projection_title_creation_trigger = yes
	}
}

h_dar_al_islam = {
	color = { 20 160 30 }
	definite_form = yes
	#ruler_uses_title_name = no
	no_automatic_claims = yes
	always_follows_primary_heir = yes
	destroy_if_invalid_heir = yes
	can_be_named_after_dynasty = no
	can_use_nomadic_naming = no

	capital = c_mecca

	can_create = {
		has_global_variable = created_dar_al_islam
	}
	can_destroy = {
	}
}

h_india = {		# Titular, created by special decision only if entire India is united
	color = { 255 110 0 }

	can_create = {
		rule_title_creation_imperial_power_projection_title_creation_trigger = yes
	}

	ai_primary_priority = {
		add = @always_primary_score
	}
}

k_papal_state = {
	color = { 255 249 198 }
	definite_form = yes
	ruler_uses_title_name = no
	can_use_nomadic_naming = no
	landless = yes

	capital = c_roma

	ai_primary_priority = {
		add = @always_primary_score
	}

	destroy_if_invalid_heir = yes
	no_automatic_claims = yes
	always_follows_primary_heir = yes
	de_jure_drift_disabled = yes
	can_use_nomadic_naming = no

	holding_regnal_male_names = { Alexander Anastasius Benedictus Caelestinus Callistus Clemens Eugenius Leo Gregorius Hadrianus Honorius Innocentius Ioannes Lucius Marinus Martinus Nicolaus Sergius Silvester Stephanus Urbanus Victor }
}

	de_jure_drift_disabled = yes
}

k_danelaw = {
	color = { 255 60 15 }
	de_jure_drift_disabled = yes

	capital = c_north_riding

	ai_primary_priority = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				culture = { has_cultural_pillar = heritage_north_germanic }
			}
			add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
		}
	}
}

e_kara_khitai = { #aka Western Liao / Great Liao
	#It's the Liao dynasty after they've been booted by the Jurchen/Jin, and have fled west
	#Should appear as "Kara Khitai" to differentiate from "Great Liao", even though it's *sort of* the same entity
	color = { 10 10 10 }
	can_use_nomadic_naming = no

	capital = c_balashagun

	can_create = {
		rule_title_creation_imperial_power_projection_title_creation_trigger = yes
	}

	cultural_names = {
		name_list_khitan = cn_kara_khitai
	}

d_yungdrung_bon = {
	color = { 219 102 96 }

	landless = yes
	definite_form = yes
	ruler_uses_title_name = no

	capital = c_xaitongmoin

	ai_primary_priority = {
		add = @always_primary_score
	}

	no_automatic_claims = yes
	always_follows_primary_heir = yes
	destroy_if_invalid_heir = yes
}

e_hre = {
	color = { 255 255 255 }

	capital = c_aachen
	definite_form = yes

	can_create = {
		rule_title_creation_imperial_power_projection_title_creation_trigger = yes
	}

	ai_primary_priority = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				culture = { has_cultural_pillar = heritage_central_germanic }
			}
			add = @correct_culture_primary_score
		}
	}
}

		name_list_pictish = cn_pictavia
		name_list_irish = cn_alba
		name_list_gaelic = cn_alba
	}

		rule_title_creation_imperial_power_projection_title_creation_trigger = yes
	}

	ai_primary_priority = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					culture = { has_cultural_pillar = heritage_west_germanic }
					culture = { has_cultural_pillar = heritage_goidelic }
					culture = { has_cultural_pillar = heritage_brythonic }
				}
			}
			add = @correct_culture_primary_score
		}
	}

	k_wales = {
		color = { 135 25 3 }

		capital = c_cardiganshire # Gwynedd

		can_create = {
			trigger_if = {
				limit = {
					is_ai = yes
				}
				culture = { has_cultural_pillar = heritage_brythonic }
			}
		}

		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:welsh
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						culture = culture:cumbrian
						culture = culture:cornish
						culture = culture:breton
					}
				}
				add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
			}
		}

	k_cornwall = {
		color = { 204 153 10 }

		can_create = {
			trigger_if = {
				limit = {
					is_ai = yes
				}
				culture = { has_cultural_pillar = heritage_brythonic }
			}
		}

		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:cornish
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						culture = culture:welsh
						culture = culture:cumbrian
						culture = culture:breton
					}
				}
				add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
			}
		}

		capital = c_cornwall
	}

	k_east_francia = {	#Germany
		color = { 160 160 160 }

		capital = c_frankfurt

		can_create = {
			trigger_if = {
				limit = { is_ai = yes }
				NOT = { exists = title:e_hre }
			}
		}

		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:franconian
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { culture = culture:franconian }
					culture = { has_cultural_pillar = heritage_central_germanic }
				}
				add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
			}
		}

e_byzantium = {
	color =  hsv{ 0.9 1 0.3 } #hsv{ 0.73 0.8 0.4 }  #hsv{ 0.77 0.8 0.6 } #{ 143 12 125 }

	capital = c_byzantion

	definite_form = yes

	can_create = {
		rule_title_creation_imperial_power_projection_title_creation_trigger = yes
		custom_tooltip = {
			text = holds_latin_empire_tt
			NOT = {
				any_held_title = {
					this = title:e_latin_empire
				}
			}
		}
	}

	ai_primary_priority = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				culture = { has_cultural_pillar = heritage_byzantine }
			}
			add = @correct_culture_primary_score
		}
	}

		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:greek
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { culture = culture:greek }
					culture = {
						OR = {
							has_cultural_pillar = heritage_byzantine
							has_cultural_pillar = heritage_caucasian
						}
					}
				}
				add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
			}

	k_cyprus = {
		color = { 215 215 20 }

		capital = c_nicosia

		can_create = {
			trigger_if = {
				limit = {
					is_ai = yes
				}
				faith = { religion_tag = christianity_religion }
			}
		}

		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:greek
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { culture = culture:greek }
					culture = {
						OR = {
							has_cultural_pillar = heritage_byzantine
							has_cultural_pillar = heritage_caucasian
						}
					}
				}
				add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
			}
		}

		cultural_names = {
			name_list_turkish = cn_kibris
		}

		d_cyprus = {
			color = { 215 215 20 }

			capital = c_nicosia

			cultural_names = {
				name_list_turkish = cn_kibris
			}

			c_nicosia = {
				color = { 200 200 20 }

				cultural_names = {
					name_list_turkish = cn_lefkosa
				}

				b_nicosia = {

	k_pontus = {
		color = { 205 130 85 }

		capital = c_trebizond

		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:greek
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { culture = culture:greek }
					culture = {
						OR = {
							has_cultural_pillar = heritage_byzantine
							has_cultural_pillar = heritage_caucasian
						}
					}
				}
				add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
			}
		}

e_scandinavia = {
	color = { 62 122 189 }

	capital = c_skane #Lund - Archbishop seat of Scandinavia

	can_create = {
		rule_title_creation_imperial_power_projection_title_creation_trigger = yes
	}

	ai_primary_priority = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					culture = { has_cultural_pillar = heritage_north_germanic }
					culture = { has_cultural_pillar = heritage_balto_finnic }
				}
			}
			add = @correct_culture_primary_score
		}
	}

	k_sweden = {

			trigger_if = {
				limit = {
					is_ai = yes
				}
				culture = { has_cultural_pillar = heritage_balto_finnic }
			}
		}

		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:sami
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
		}

e_wendish_empire = {
	color = { 130 10 0 }

	capital = c_vidzeme # Riga

	definite_form = yes

	can_create = {
		rule_title_creation_imperial_power_projection_title_creation_trigger = yes
	}

	ai_primary_priority = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				culture = { has_cultural_pillar = heritage_baltic }
			}
			add = @correct_culture_primary_score
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				culture = { has_cultural_pillar = heritage_balto_finnic }
			}
			add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
		}
	}

		color = { 110 80 168 }

		capital = c_vidzeme # Riga

		#Titular: created by decision.

		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:latgalian
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						culture = culture:latgalian
					}
				}
				add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
			}
		}
	}
}

		rule_title_creation_imperial_power_projection_title_creation_trigger = yes
	}

		if = {
			limit = {
				culture = { has_cultural_pillar = heritage_west_slavic }
			}
			add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
		}
	}

	k_bohemia = {
		color = { 176 110 32 }

e_france = {
	color = { 11 22 170 }

	capital = c_ile_de_france

	can_create = {
		rule_title_creation_imperial_power_projection_title_creation_trigger = yes
	}

	ai_primary_priority = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				culture = culture:french
			}
			add = @correct_culture_primary_score
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					culture = culture:norman
					culture = culture:occitan
				}
			}
			add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
		}
	}

	k_aquitaine = {
		color = { 101 50 253 }

		capital = c_bordeaux # Bordaeux

		can_create = {
			trigger_if = {
				limit = {
					is_ai = yes
				}
				NOT = { has_title = title:k_france }
			}
		}

		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:occitan
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						culture = culture:norman
						culture = culture:french
					}
				}
				add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
			}
		}

e_spain = {
	color = { 233 200 20 }

	capital = c_toledo # Toledo
	can_be_named_after_dynasty = no

	cultural_names = {
		name_list_bedouin = cn_isbaniya
		name_list_butr = cn_isbaniya
		name_list_baranis = cn_isbaniya
		name_list_zaghawa = cn_isbaniya
		name_list_levantine = cn_isbaniya
		name_list_egyptian = cn_isbaniya
		name_list_maghrebi = cn_isbaniya
		name_list_andalusian = cn_isbaniya
		name_list_yemeni = cn_isbaniya
	}

	can_create = {
		custom_description = {
			text = form_hispania_must_end_struggle_trigger

			NOT = { exists = struggle:iberian_struggle }
		}

		rule_title_creation_imperial_power_projection_title_creation_trigger = yes
	}

	ai_primary_priority = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				culture = { has_cultural_pillar = heritage_iberian }
			}
			add = @correct_culture_primary_score
		}
	}

	k_andalusia = {
		color = { 31 138 40 }

		capital = c_cordoba # Cordoba
		can_be_named_after_dynasty = no

		cultural_names = {
			name_list_bedouin = cn_al_andalus
			name_list_baranis = cn_al_andalus
			name_list_butr = cn_al_andalus
			name_list_zaghawa = cn_al_andalus
			name_list_levantine = cn_al_andalus
	 		name_list_egyptian = cn_al_andalus
	 		name_list_maghrebi = cn_al_andalus
	 		name_list_andalusian = cn_al_andalus
	 		name_list_yemeni = cn_al_andalus
	 	}

		can_create = {
			trigger_if = {
				limit = {
					is_ai = yes
				}
				culture = { has_cultural_pillar = heritage_arabic }
			}
		}

		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:andalusian
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
		}

		d_cordoba = {
			color = { 60 180 12 }

			capital = c_cordoba # Cordoba
			can_be_named_after_dynasty = no

			cultural_names = {
				name_list_bedouin = cn_qurtubah

				name_list_zaghawa = cn_qurtubah
				name_list_levantine = cn_qurtubah
				name_list_egyptian = cn_qurtubah
				name_list_maghrebi = cn_qurtubah
				name_list_andalusian = cn_qurtubah
				name_list_yemeni = cn_qurtubah
			}

			c_cordoba = {
				color = { 60 180 12 }
				can_be_named_after_dynasty = no

				cultural_names = {
					name_list_bedouin = cn_qurtubah
					name_list_baranis = cn_qurtubah
					name_list_butr = cn_qurtubah
					name_list_zaghawa = cn_qurtubah
					name_list_levantine = cn_qurtubah
					name_list_egyptian = cn_qurtubah
					name_list_maghrebi = cn_qurtubah
					name_list_andalusian = cn_qurtubah
					name_list_yemeni = cn_qurtubah
				}

				b_cordoba = {
					province = 1995

					color = { 60 180 12 }

					cultural_names = {
						name_list_bedouin = cn_qurtubah
						name_list_baranis = cn_qurtubah
						name_list_butr = cn_qurtubah
						name_list_zaghawa = cn_qurtubah
						name_list_levantine = cn_qurtubah
						name_list_egyptian = cn_qurtubah

		rule_title_creation_imperial_power_projection_title_creation_trigger = yes
	}

	ai_primary_priority = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					culture = { has_cultural_pillar = heritage_west_african }
					culture = { has_cultural_pillar = heritage_sahelian }
					culture = { has_cultural_pillar = heritage_senegambian }
				}
			}
			add = @correct_culture_primary_score
		}
	}

	}

# NOBLE FAMILIES

# 867

d_nf_ampelas = { # Ampelas (Khaldia)
	color = { 100 100 100 }
	capital = c_byzantion

	definite_form = yes
	landless = yes
	ruler_uses_title_name = no
	always_follows_primary_heir = yes
	no_automatic_claims = yes
	noble_family = yes
	destroy_if_invalid_heir = yes

	ai_primary_priority = { add = @never_primary_score }
}

e_goryeo = {
	color = { 220 205 250 }

	capital = c_gaeseong

	can_create = {
		trigger_if = {
			limit = {
				culture = {
					OR = {
						has_cultural_pillar = heritage_korean
						any_parent_culture = { has_cultural_pillar = heritage_korean }
					}
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = unify_goryeo_decision_requirement_tt
				NOT = { government_allows = administrative }
			}
		}
	}

	# Ceremonial Liege/Regent in personal relation summary
	#
	# Scopes
	# ------
	# root: Inspected character (who holds this title).
	# target: Character we are evaluating relationships to (usually local player).
	# title: This title (held by inspected character).
	# liege: Inspected characters liege.
	# vassal: Vassal who matches the trigger below, if any.
	#
	# Alternate descriptions are provided to trim the extra "Your" before this entry in the summary.
	#
	personal_relation_entry = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:target
					scope:vassal ?= scope:target
				}
				desc = japan_personal_relation_ceremonial_regent_same
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = { exists = scope:vassal }
				desc = japan_personal_relation_ceremonial_regent_other
			}
		}
	}
	personal_relation_vassal = {
		has_title = title:k_yongson_throne
	}

	k_goguryeo = {
		color = { 136 81 148 }

		d_yukju = {
			color = { 30 40 145 }

			capital = c_jangjeong

			c_jangjeong = {
				color = { 35 35 120 }

				b_Goryeo_Bukgye_Jangjeong = {
					province = 9887

					color = { 35 35 120 }
				}
				b_Goryeo_Bukgye_Sakju = {
					province = 9888

					color = { 35 35 120 }
				}
				b_FIC_EMan_Bao = {
					province = 12454

					color = { 35 35 120 }

# Korean King
k_yongson_throne = {
	color = { 220 205 250 }

	capital = c_gaeseong
	can_be_named_after_dynasty = no
	landless = yes
	figurehead = yes
	allow_domicile = no
	always_follows_primary_heir = yes
	definite_form = yes

	can_create = { always = no }

	# Ceremonial Liege/Regent in personal relation summary
	# (reminder: the ceremonial liege if mechanically a vassal of the ceremonial regent)
	#
	# Scopes
	# ------
	# root: Inspected character (who holds this title).
	# target: Character we are evaluating relationships to (usually local player).
	# title: This title (held by inspected character).
	# liege: Inspected characters liege.
	# vassal: Vassal who matches the trigger below, if any.
	#
	# Alternate descriptions are provided to trim the extra "Your" before this entry in the summary.
	#
	personal_relation_entry = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:target
					scope:liege ?= scope:target
				}
				desc = japan_personal_relation_ceremonial_liege_same
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = { exists = scope:liege }
				desc = japan_personal_relation_ceremonial_liege_other
			}
		}
	}

	ai_primary_priority = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				culture = { has_cultural_pillar = heritage_korean }
			}
			add = @correct_culture_primary_score
		}
	}
}
